title: Gheorghe Zamfir - the roumanian recordings
description:
Gheorhe Zamfir was the brightes shining star of socialist Roumania, almost making it bigtime in the rest of the europe, putting roumania on the musical map of many an interested listener (in France specially). He was one of the few artists to gain (almost) total control over the sound and arrangement of his recordings, directed his own orchestra, and in time became the orchestrator of most of electrecords folkloric output (sneaking in gypsies allthough it was ilegal). For who knows what reason (probably money) he left roumania and its music to start recording kitschy easy listening tracks ala James Last. Sic transit gloria mundi.

This collection is far from complete. I know of at least two records not represented here (can't remember their names though...).
Let me know if you find some of them.
